issues.title: Missing Hover States on Project Cards
issues.description: Project cards appear interactive (shadow changes on hover) but don't have cursor-pointer class, making it unclear to users that the cards are clickable.
acceptance_criteria: All project cards in index.html have cursor-pointer class
All project cards in OtherProjects.html have cursor-pointer class
Cursor pointer appears on hover for all clickable project cards

issues.title: Inconsistent Navigation Links
issues.description: 'Selected Projects' and 'Other Projects' navigation links are inconsistent across pages, causing potential confusion for users navigating the site.
acceptance_criteria: All navigation links standardized across all pages. Selected Projects should navigate to Selected Projects section on index and Other Projects to OtherProjects.html
Navigation is consistent across index.html, OtherProjects.html, and individual project pages
All pages follow the same navigation pattern
issues.resolution: Consolidated navigation into shared component with consistent links across all pages

issues.title: Code Duplication - Navigation Bar & Footer
issues.description: Navigation bar and footer sections are duplicated across all HTML files, violating DRY principles and making maintenance more difficult.
acceptance_criteria: Navigation bar is consolidated into a single reusable component
Footer is consolidated into a single reusable component
All HTML pages reference the shared navigation and footer
Solution works with static site (GitHub Pages) without build system
locations: All HTML files - navigation and footer sections
issues.resolution: Created /components/ directory with navigation.html, footer.html, and shared-components.js loader

issues.title: Establish Button Hierarchy System
issues.description: Multiple button styles throughout the site create confusion about visual hierarchy and interaction patterns. A consistent button system needs to be established.
acceptance_criteria: Primary button style defined: Filled blue with white text
Secondary button style defined: Outline blue
Tertiary button style defined: Text-only with underline
All buttons across the site conform to one of the three styles
Consistent hover states defined and implemented for all button types
Button styles are documented in a style guide
